plot: Chronicling the life and times of dancer Tehreema Mitha, the camera examines the role of traditional Hindustani and modern dance in the contemporary Pakistani society.
title: Aur Woh Raks Karte Rahi
plot_es: Chronicling the life and times of dancer Tehreema Mitha, the camera examines the role of traditional Hindustani and modern dance in the contemporary Pakistani society.
plot_en: Chronicling the life and times of dancer Tehreema Mitha, the camera examines the role of traditional Hindustani and modern dance in the contemporary Pakistani society.
